data.actual_result: A notification appears and the welcome message is in English
data.expected_result: A notification appears and the welcome message is in the language set in Discord, as it appears in the app
data.short_description: Welcome messages use English in notifications, not the language set in Discord
data.steps_to_repro: - Change your Discord language to something other than English - Enable welcome messages on a server - Make sure mobile push notifications are enabled on that server - Close the discord app and have someone join the server
